message.body: Would you do my Sunday this week and I would do your Monday this week?
I meant next Monday not today
Actually would you just do my Sunday and I don't know that I can take your Monday
Sunday the 12th? I can do it. I'll plan on doing the 13th too but if you want to just let me know - I'm off that day so short notice is no problem. Bon voyage!
Ps. I was sorry to hear that you got ditched this weekend, woof!
Yes Sunday the 12th! I have a wedding in CT and not sure what time I will be home. Thank you! Woof to the big bad ditch!
